text: Archbishop Joan Enric Vives i Sicília (born 24 July 1949) is the current Bishop of Urgell and Co-Prince of Andorra. Born in Barcelona, he became a priest in 1974. On 19 March 2010, he became an archbishop. == References == Category:1949 births Category:Living people Category:Current national leaders Category:People from Barcelona Category:Princes of Andorra Category:Spanish Roman Catholic archbishops
title: Joan Enric Vives Sicília
